name: Android Assassins
description:
This is a 2-4 player Euro-like game wherein each player attempts to outpace the other by completing enough tier 3 contracts turn earn 10 victory points. Players start off as a humble assassin with minimal gear and must work their way through tier 1 and 2 contracts before they can attempt the tier 3 contracts. Feel the thrill completing contracts along side your friends as fellow robot assassins!

Flavor Text: "Welcome, erm... robot.. assassin, sir. Looking to make a bit of dirty coin in these rough times I see? Well, you're in the right place. Here you can choose from a variety of contracts that suit your skillset, earn coin from them when you're done, and possibly treat yourself to some state-of-the-art upgrades for your android armor and software! Once you do that, you might have an itch to climb the assassin ladder and go for some of the most high-priority contracts available. Will you be able to complete them before your competitors? Let's find out!"

Game Link (don't include the quotes): "https://tabletopia.com/playground/android-assassins-jm9jgy/play-now"
